dcterms:creator: S. Stein
S. J. McKenna
dcterms:description: The 50 Salads dataset contains 50 videos, by 25 participants, with 52 of the lowest level action classes, totaling 2967 labelled actions. Example actions include 'cut tomato prep', 'cut tomato core', and 'cut tomato post'.
dcterms:title: 50 Salads

dcterms:creator: H. Kuehne
A. Arslan
T. Serre
dcterms:description: The Breakfast dataset contains 433 sequences performed by 52 participants, with 3078 actions across 50 classes in 18 different kitchens. It includes various breakfast routines such as 'cooking scrambled eggs' and 'making tea'.
dcterms:title: Breakfast

dcterms:creator: M. Rohrbach
S. Amin
M. Andriluka
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The MPII Cooking 2 dataset consists of 275 sequences from 30 participants in one kitchen, containing 14105 actions across 88 classes. Example actions include 'shake', 'spread', and 'apply plaster'.
dcterms:title: MPII Cooking 2

dcterms:creator: D. Damen
H. Doughty
G. M. Farinella
S. Fidler
A. Furnari
E. Kazakos
D. Moltisanti
J. Munro
T. Perrett
W. Price
M. Wray
dcterms:description: The EPIC dataset is designed for egocentric vision, focusing on kitchen activities and providing a large-scale benchmark for action recognition.
dcterms:title: EPIC
